About Me

A few things...

BIO

I am a calm and focused person who can work individually and as part of a work team. In the last 2 years I have worked with different technologies as a web developer. I have the ability to learn quickly and not give up on what I do. I love my family, my friends, my dog and this great profession.

RBC de Mexico

Full Stack Developer

I was part of a development team that used different technologies for the development of two large projects. I worked as Full Stack Web Developer using technologies such as React for user interfaces and Node using Express for the backend. For the database service, I used MongoDB. And other tools involved in the MERN development. I had the opportunity to learn things from hard-working people and many other important work values.
